attributes.title: VILE AND DISGUSTING🤮🤮
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever come across. The customer service is awful. I simply asked for help on how to get trump banned from office and trump sent a RAT!! to my house. It gave my husband and me RABIES!! And my husband died.

attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: this is all took forever to download and put a virus on my phone so now i’m very upset that i do not get to have an app for our racist homophobic sexist disgusting idiotic president:(

attributes.title: Awful app!!!🤮🤮
attributes.review: Took forever to download and hacked my entire system when it’s did!! Don’t download this it’s a waste of time!!

attributes.title: TREMENDOUS FAILURE
attributes.review: I thought I would try this app to see what our racist, homophobic, misogynistic, xenophobic president was up to. Worst app (president) ever. 0 out of 10 would not recommend voting for him if you are a women, BIPOC, ally, or human. BLACK LIVES MATTER.

attributes.title: Terrible app overall
attributes.review: This app just disgusts me and the way it presents itself just exaggerates my disgust. The app is full of bugs and Is never fixed

attributes.title: Bad review
attributes.review: This is a horrible app it’s way too glitchy and has bad stuff on this app if u do download it might as well delete the app

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is so horrible. it took 2 days to fully download and when i logged out the app shut me out. when i finally got it working all the app talked about was some fake news and the information was not true. this is most definitely the worst app out here. don’t download ever!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: It didn’t load in anything of what was said of them app and was SUPER slow wouldn’t recommend or try again

attributes.title: I can’t believe this
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to see what my lovely president had to say but I’m in utter disappointment. I’ll give it a good rating when fat pigs fly ❤️✨🧚‍♀️
